titleStmt.title: A fvnerall elegie vpon the mvch lamented death of that most reverend, pious, and judiciovs divine John Polyander of Kerckhoven, doctor and cheife [sic] professor of divnitie [sic] in the famous Vniversitie of Leyden, and there the 8th time magnificus rector.
titleStmt.author: Brunsell, Samuel, 1619 or 20-1688.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
